function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of guidelines for residential buildings' resilience to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and health issues in residential areas","Mitigation":"Develop comprehensive guidelines for building design and transformation to mitigate disease transmission","Technologies":"Building ventilation systems, UV light sanitation technology","People":"Residents, building owners, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, local authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate social and spatial framework for collective housing","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing effective disease control measures in collective housing","Mitigation":"Improve social and spatial design to enable better disease control and management","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, spatial reconfiguration","People":"Residents, local authorities, urban planners","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners"},{"Description":"Insufficient role of architects in the resilience process","Impact":"Lack of expertise in building design to mitigate disease transmission","Mitigation":"Enhance the role of architects in designing disease-resilient buildings, provide training and guidelines","Technologies":"Building material innovations, digital design tools","People":"Architects, building owners, residents","Owner":"Architects, building owners, professional organizations"}]}
